doc:
These enumeration values describe the possible transitions between pages in a widget.

New values may be added to this enumeration over time.

members.doc: Slide from left or right according to the children order
members.name: slide_left_right

members.doc: Slide from top down or bottom up according to the order
members.name: slide_up_down

members.doc: Cover the old page by sliding up. Since 3.12
members.name: over_up

members.doc: Cover the old page by sliding down. Since: 3.12
members.name: over_down

members.doc: Cover the old page by sliding to the left. Since: 3.12
members.name: over_left

members.doc: Cover the old page by sliding to the right. Since: 3.12
members.name: over_right

members.doc: Uncover the new page by sliding up. Since 3.12
members.name: under_up

members.doc: Uncover the new page by sliding down. Since: 3.12
members.name: under_down

members.doc: Uncover the new page by sliding to the left. Since: 3.12
members.name: under_left

members.doc: Uncover the new page by sliding to the right. Since: 3.12
members.name: under_right

members.doc: Cover the old page or uncover the new page, according to order. Since: 3.12
members.name: over_up_down

name: StackTransitionType
